name: memory-mcp
description: Brain-inspired memory system with smart context loading and semantic search
long_description: Memory MCP v2.0 is a complete TypeScript rewrite delivering 50% token savings through dual-response architecture and SQLite FTS5 search. Features intelligent token budgeting with max_tokens parameter, auto-generated 20-word summaries, hybrid scoring, and lightweight ~3MB bundle. Includes 3 streamlined MCP tools with automatic entity extraction, importance scoring, and full provenance tracking.

databasePath.title: Database Path
databasePath.description: Path to SQLite database file for storing memories

defaultTTLDays.title: Default TTL (Days)
defaultTTLDays.description: Default time-to-live for memories in days

enableAutoCapture.title: Enable Auto-Capture
enableAutoCapture.description: Automatically extract and store facts from conversations

tools.name: memory_store
tools.description: Store or update memories with automatic entity extraction, 20-word summary generation, and importance scoring. Provide 'id' to update existing memory, omit to create new. Supports fact, entity, relationship, and self memory types.

tools.name: memory_recall
tools.description: Semantic search with dual-response pattern: returns 'index' (all matches as summaries) + 'details' (top matches with full content within token budget). Use max_tokens parameter to control response size (default: 1000). Supports filtering by type, entities, tags, and importance.

tools.name: memory_forget
tools.description: Delete or archive memories by ID. Supports soft delete (preserves provenance) or hard delete (permanent removal). Can batch delete multiple IDs. Optional reason parameter for audit trail.
